name: Otona no Mondai
nutshell:
Aka Otona no Mondai
From Fifay.net:
Naoto is a stressed-out college student doing his best to juggle the eccentricities of his divorced parents with his own burgeoning romance. His stress deepens after his gay father proposes to the handsome and elegant male lover. This is a humourous series by Ima Ichiko about the modern, dysfunctional family.

name: The Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild - At the same time, with the same face
Nagi no Oitoma
nutshell:
Ooshima Nagi is an 28 year old office lady always trying to read the mood and fit in. Berated by her boss, taken advantage of by her colleagues, and betrayed by her boyfriend, Nagi quits her job and severs contact with everyone in her social circle in order to restart her life from scratch. Will Nagi be able to change herself, or will she fall back into her old ways?
Note: Nominated for the 11th Manga Taishou Awards (2018).
Nominated for the 12th Manga Taishou Awards (2019).
Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Awards (2020).

name: The Duty of a True Friend
nutshell:
Released in 1983 by Shueisha, this volume brings together two special one-shots of Masami Kurumada published in previous years. The manga also includes six chapters of Sukeban Arashi, which had not been added to the previously released two volumes of this series.
Contents:

Mabudachi Jingi
Shiroobi Taishou
Sukeban Arashi:
The Appearance of the Sukeban
Die Star!
The Resentment of Lunch Box
The Love Letter!
Daddy is the Best!
Happiness Dedicated to Mother

name: Tokyo Ghoul - Akakatabami (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Tokyo Ghoul DJ- A collection of stories that revolved around Kaneki’s interactions with Uta, Tsukiyama and Himaru.

name: The Book of Human Insects
nutshell:
Still in her early twenties, beautiful Toshiko Tomura has won the Akutagawa Prize for her story "The Book of Human Insects." The great honor is not her first: she has previously won the New York Design Academy Award, before which she was the lead actress of an established theatrical troupe. Yet, while the media go abuzz, the woman in the limelight slips away from the metropolis; what the sole paparazzo who manages to trail her to an abandoned country house witnesses is an immobile figure of an old woman and the star herself, naked, in a reverie as bizarre as it is erotic!

Volumes 271 and 272 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works

name: Shaded Lovers
nutshell:
Shinichi Akamine is an ordinary college student in Japan who makes manga in his spare time but he never thought this would completely change his life.
One day, Shinichi realizes that the main characters of his manga came to life, but they are not quite the way he imagined them to be. While in the manga they love each other, in life they are each other’s deadly enemy.
What are they going to do with this bizarre situation together?

name: Negative Twin-Tower!
nutshell:
Hyoudou Kaname and Shishido Makoto are two abnormally tall (over 180 cm!), sharp-eyed high school girls. That, in addition to Kaname's emotional instability and violent outbursts, has instilled a fear of the two girls in all their classmates. But, though they're bad at dealing with people, they are actually normal girls. They just want to hang out with friends, have boyfriends, and enjoy high school like other girls, but they fail whenever they try. If they don't get discouraged and continue to work at getting to know others, will a day come when they can smile and be happy? It's a high tension school comedy drawn with a unique style and tempo.
Wikipedia
The Doujinshi & Manga Lexicon
Vol. 1
Vol. 2
Vol. 3
Vol. 4
Vol. 5

name: Kawaisugi Crisis
nutshell:
Alien who thought that it would be better if Earth was just destroyed due to its civilization being at a far lower level than hers reconsiders it after seeing cute things.
(Source: Shueisha, translated)

name: Gekiman! - Devilman Chapter
nutshell: A semi-fictional autobiography of the creation of Devilman.

name: Mida Love ♪
nutshell: Andou Ryousei decides the way he live his own life, rather than following in his playful parents way of living. One day, during his 17th birthday, his childhood friend gave him a present. It was the perfect chance for him to confess his love to her but something strange happened!?. What is missing from Ryousei! A new serialization with max libido!

name: [GwangGong Industrial Complex] WEAKNESS
nutshell: A good personality, plenty popular, rich, and without a fault, the real G Conglomerate's perfect daughter, Gu Do-Yeon. However, Do-Yeon’s step sister, Gu Iseo, is crass and unpleasant. Even considering that, Do-Yeon was lucky and born with a silver spoon in her mouth, just where in the world can you find a perfect person like her? But in the end, Do-Yeon’s weak point is discovered. Hiding out in her apartment, Iseo sees a version of Do-Yeon that is completely different from her usual self.

name: Chichi no Jikan
nutshell:
Chichi no Jikan follows Shinogi Kyūichi, a male biology student who lives in an apartment near a helpful female neighbor/friend, Takarai Ayaka. One day, he is visited by aliens, who demand that he raise their baby for a year… or else the world is history. The baby is apparently human, and is raised the way humans are: through breast-feeding. Kyūichi's sex is not a problem for the aliens: they give him a simple device that switches his body to a woman's with the mere touch of a button. Conveniently, Kyūichi's female form is very well-endowed.
Although she's understandably confused and uncomfortable by the whole situation, Ayaka helps Kyūichi out as he navigates the unfamiliar experience of raising a child, and breast-feeding it in particular. That means going to a store to buy a breast pump, visiting a maternity hospital to get a massage to release Kyūichi's stored-up milk, and giving the baby a bath together. Kyūichi, as a biology student, is fascinated by the whole thing from an academic perspective.

name: THE iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls - Comic Anthology cool
Senpai no Kanojo
nutshell: Junpei Kususe falls for his senpai's girlfriend. Who is she? And what about his own girlfriend Ema?

name: An Exorbitant Wife
nutshell: The unfortunate little Li Qian Luo accidentally married a man who happens to be a god tier wife defender. Welcome to how to get revenge on your ex-boyfriend!

name: Flawless Metropolitan Divine Emperor
nutshell: The first thing that Jiang Feng saw when he opened his eyes, is that his hands are on his class teacher's Breast!! Owwu~ This, this is the time before I cultivate! The Immortal emperor has once again return to the mortal world!

name: Ai Mai Mii
nutshell: The story follows the lives of the girls Ai, Mai, Mi and Ponoka-senpai, who together form the "Manga Club" where they fight against alien invaders, face fierce rivals and do all sorts of crazy things when they are not drawing manga.

name: Haibane Seikatsu Nisshi
nutshell:
a sort of more joke oriented omake of Haibane Renmei.
translated/edited by Chirlind and Charp.

name: Crowd
nutshell: Kyuhyun is a bullied bread shuttle in high school who dreams of breaking free from the spiral of abuse. Just the usual story. The twist? He suddenly gets introduced to a secretive crowdfunding app, "Fencer", that allows one to put bounties on bullies and if the target funding is met, anonymous hunters are dispatched to beat the shit out of them. And Kyuhyun is off to a good start, having discovered by chance the identity of "Hood", one of the strongest hunters. Between sadistic bullies, backstabbing colleagues and secret pasts, watch as he crowdfunds his way out of misery!

name: Aru Hi, Bokura ga Koi ni Ochitara
nutshell: Gay script writer Souma meets up with his best friend from college, Kozono, six years after last seeing each other. After meeting again like this, has Kozono become Souma's type?

name: Sensei, Suki Desu.
nutshell: A bachelor for the past 11 years, Higuchi Yuuki is a male teacher in an all-girls school. He keeps wondering how to bridge the gap between himself and his students when he's suddenly confessed to by Ichikawa, one of his students! Although Higuchi rejects her, Ichikawa does all she can to get her teacher to turn her way – even if it means making him grope her and holding his hand in class! When Higuchi can't understand why she'd like an unimpressive and inexperienced guy like him, she kisses him! Will Higuchi be able to handle the feelings of his beautiful student, especially when she is not the only one to have fallen for him?!? A dramatic school love story unfolds!

name: My Devil Prison Guard
nutshell: Yeon, a high school boy who died in an accident while hiding a great crime of a murder. The place his soul had awakened was a prison in hell, and the devil's prison guard "Nell" who watches him as a prisoner.

name: Nyoroko's Live Broadcasting!
nutshell: "Uhm-uhm… N-Nice to meet you! I'm Nyoroko". A girl – not good at talking to people – is invited by her friend Matsuri and and challenged into doing a live broadcast for her first time. A youthful 4-koma comedy!

name: Momentum
tags: Long Strip,Comedy,Boys' Love,Drama,Web Comic,Slice of Life
nutshell:
«Momentum» is a series of beautifully drawn vignettes that glimpse into the life-altering moments of several couples as they fall in and out of love. This BL features a series of characters learning how to love, understand, and forgive one another — and in some cases, the world — at different moments in their lives.
Une histoire prenante, blessante mais qui fait terriblement du bien.
Une atmosphère tendue et des scènes simples mais de génie.
Bref, je frissonne à chaque fois que je lis cette merveille.
Take 8 : Complet - (chapitres 1 à 7)
M's Study : Complet - (chapitres 8 à 17)
Preference and Prejudice : Complet- (chapitres 18 à 25)
Therapist : Complet - (chapitres 26 à 34)
Trainer : Complet - (chapitres 35 à 41)
Banker : Complet - (chapitres 42 à 54)
Phantom : En cours - (chapitre 55 à 79)

Raw (Ridibooks)
Official Japanese Translation

name: Ouji Hiroimashita
nutshell: Ginga, who comes from a poor family, picks up Ouji, a son from a noble family. Soon after, Ginga tries to avoid Ouji due to their different lifestyles, but Ouji becomes extremely attached to Ginga, suddenly kisses him, and says "I love you!"

name: Koisuru Taka wa Tsume o Kakusu
nutshell: Takumi is scary looking, strong in fights and respected by his juniors when in fact he is sensitive to the point of crying at every opportunity. Natsuki, the "protector" appointed to Takumi, is always around to keep him from getting into trouble. The two boys are childhood friends and ever since Takumi came to his aid one time when they were kids, Natsuki has been in love with him. He has no intention of ever revealing his true feelings, but due to a strange combination of circumstances, Natsuki ends up stealing Takumi's first kiss!

name: Nijiiro Secret
nutshell:
Mayoeru Kohitsuji wa Madoroi nagara mo
Hajikete Tansan, Natsu Moyou.
Sugarcraft wa Yuuten wo Shiranai
Shiroi Toiki wa Yakedo ni Nite
Anata wa, Watashi no

name: Kimama ni Tanteigyou
nutshell: The young Yamato Yousuke searches for a way to follow in the steps of his father, a detective who passed away in mission trying to save a little kid who got kidnapped. Finally, an opportunity to become a detective himself has arisen, but in the middle of carrying out his first assignment, a test to see if he would be a good detective, Yousuke suddenly gets hired, apparently for no reason. There must be a secret behind all this…

name: Great Zhou Immortal Officials
nutshell: Li Mu, from a poor family, traveled to the world of enchanting and enchanting fairy tales, and originally only wanted to survive forever. But the little fox rescued accidentally wanted to agree with her. The violent female neighbor was Bai Fumei, and the cold boss also preferred him... The helpless Li Mu had tears in his eyes and tears. Reluctantly began his vigorous Xianxia life.

name: Bluehole Marriage
nutshell:
Choi Kang Il, was a member of an idol group, L.I.P. When he reached his peak of popularity, L.I.P decided to disband. Time passed, his popularity faded, even when he got married to a famous novelist, no media bothered to cover their story. They didn't even hide their marriage, it's the media who had not paid attention to their lives. Is it possible for them to have a happy marriage?

• Official Indonesian
